MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the CW5 postcode area of Nantwich, affecting properties in Jackson Street and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:01pm.  In order to complete repairs, engineers on site will need to isolate the power to other properties at 5:30PM and we expect the power to be restored by 8:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:13PM on 14th January 2021
